heading: ***WINTER WEATHER ADVISORIES FROM THE ADIRONDACKS WEST IN NY THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY***Today
text: Some limited breaks of morning sun, then mostly cloudy. A rising chance of afternoon rain showers, mixed with snow in the mountains. Highs in the 30s to near 40 north, in the 40s south. Southwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph, decreasing during the afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of rain changing to snow through NY, spreading east overnight, mixing with snow south late. Lows in the 20s from the Green Mountains west, some teens in the Adirondacks, and 30 to 35 east and south. Winds southwest near 10 mph, shifting to the north, west of the Green Mountains, late.

heading: Thursday
text: Occasional light snow or snow showers, with some valley rain, tapering off west to east. Totals 3 to 6 inches in NY, 1 to 3 inches from the Champlain Valley east, and an inch or less southeast VT and southern NH. Some afternoon clearing in southern valleys. Colder. Highs in the teens to low 20s west, and upper 20s and 30s east, falling through the day. Winds becoming west near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph.
